data.app_name: Pickleball Pro - by Eleven Table Tennis
data.description:
Unleash your inner Pickleball Pro! The Ultimate Pickleball simulator from the developers of Eleven Table Tennis.

EARLY ACCESS UPDATE - 90%+ of the content has now been released! now is the time to grab the nearly full content at the discounted price. The final 1.0 release is coming very soon by early Fall 2024 this will include the final component which is scored 1v1 and 2v2 multiplayer (Free-play MP is already available for play now). 

ðŸ”¥ **Pricing Alert:**  The 1.0 release will mark our feature complete base simulator and will come with a price raise from $19.99 to $29.99 as announced in 2023 when early access began.

# Multiplayer
- Host and join 1v1 and 2v2 multiplayer! (Free-play only with scored matches coming very soon in the 1.0 release)

# Singleplayer
- Engage in thrilling 1v1 and 2v2 single-player matches against skilled bots and to put your skills to the ultimate test.

# Training
- Harness the power of a fully customizable ball machine. Engineer the perfect shot, set the spin, angle, and speed, then let it rip!

- Dive into specialized training tools designed to master the art of dinks, drops, slams, drives, volleys, and serves.
